Chinese.name: 身份证识别
Chinese.description: 本示例使用 COS 触发器，并调用AI接口实现身份证识别。
Chinese.attention: 该云函数使用了AI 身份证识别功能，需要到控制台上开通服务。

English.name: IDCardDetection
English.description: This demo uses COS trigger and calls AI interface to realize ID card recognition
English.attention: This function uses the AI ID card recognition function, and you need to open the service on the console.
